Package police.methodcalls

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseMethodCall
    Base class from which all MethodCalls inherit.
    CaseHistoryMethodCall
    Returns the outcomes (case history) for the specified crime.
    CrimeAvailabilityMethodCall
    Encapsulates the following Police API methods: crimes-street-dates: Lists dates for which data is available.
    CrimeCategoriesMethodCall
    Get a map of crime category slugs to their human-readable names.
    ForcesMethodCall
    Acquire information about police forces
    NeighbourhoodsMethodCall
    Gets neighbourhoods for a specific force.
    StreetLevelCrimeMethodCall
    Represents a call to the Police API which returns a list of crimes within a mile of a given point or within an area specified.
    StreetLevelOutcomesMethodCall
    Outcomes at street-level; either at a specific location, within a 1 mile radius of a single point, or within a custom area.
